summary: App with Cases feature (stored in backend canister). Version 94 introduced task icon and workflow changes that broke Cases loading on both Dashboard and Cases pages (blank list regression from Version 93).
architectural_notes: Cases are stored in a backend Motoko canister and displayed on both the Dashboard and Cases pages.
known_issues: Version 94 regression: Cases show blank list on Dashboard and Cases pages; worked fine in Version 93. Changes in V94 were frontend-only (task icons and workflow logic).

existing_features.title: Investigate and fix the Version 94 frontend regression that causes a blank Cases list on both the Dashboard and Cases pages. The only changes in Version 94 were to workflow/task icons and their associated logic. Compare the current frontend code for cases data fetching and rendering (useQueries.ts, CasesListView.tsx, DashboardView.tsx, CaseCard.tsx, ChecklistEditor.tsx, WorkflowIcon.tsx) against the last known working state to identify where the icon/workflow changes broke Cases loading. Restore Cases loading to the working state from Version 93 while keeping any valid icon improvements intact.

projectName: Fix Cases loading regression from Version 94 (blank list on Dashboard and Cases pages)
